Key Match Events: David Miller c Yadav b Pandya 21 (17b 1x4 1x6 37m)
Kagiso Rabada c Yadav b Pandya 4 (3b 1x4 0x6 5m)
Pre-Game Insights: India's brightest stars have resolutely reinvented their games because they really wanted to be here
South Africa have the weight of history to deal with
Jasprit Bumrah gets to bowl four overs in a T20 game
Heinrich Klaasen is on similarly good terms with the forces that make simple human beings extraordinary
Post-Match Reflections: India should be reminded that they are excellent teams and exceptional people
They should both be able to share their love with family
Enjoy the compassion of their fans
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is only the seventh T20 World Cup match between India and South Africa
Never has this tournament yielded a champion who has remained unbeaten
The final will be played on pitch No. 4, which was used for the games between Namibia and Oman, and Scotland and England
Others: There is a threat of rain over this final but it does have a reserve day
